metadata.name: DGA Token
metadata.description:
Buy for the art only!

That being said, The DGA token will be my airdrop token.  
For each DGA Token held you'll be entered into random raffles for a chance to win an airdrop. Drops will be spontaneously as The Muse commands it to be, no promises, no schedules, again, buy for the art first.

The DGA token is an expansion of the Golden membership tokens.  
Every Golden membership holder can choose to burn their membership token(s) to receive 2 DGA Tokens. (you'll get 2 DGA tokens + an OG Collector Token + 1 Extra airdrop for every Golden membership token you decide to burn).

Membership tokens can be found here:  
https://opensea.io/collection/digitalape-membership-tokens

Reach out to me on Twitter if you want to burn 1 or more Golden membership tokens.
